thread.title: Watch Donald Trump Go Off On A Bizarre Rant About Tiny Cameras And Being A Germaphobe In Response To Yesterday‚Äôs Intelligence Bombshell
thread.title_full: Watch Donald Trump Go Off On A Bizarre Rant About Tiny Cameras And Being A Germaphobe In Response To Yesterday‚Äôs Intelligence Bombshell

author: Stacey Ritzen
title: Watch Donald Trump Go Off On A Bizarre Rant About Tiny Cameras And Being A Germaphobe In Response To Yesterday‚Äôs Intelligence Bombshell
text:
Donald Trump held his first press conference on Wednesday after being elected President of the United States, conveniently less than 24 hours after damning reports came out that his campaign had been involved in illicit communications with Russia , and of course, that whole ‚Äúgolden showers‚Äù thing (which seems to be here to stay ). Introducing the president-elect, White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer admonished the press for even entertaining what is so obviously a news story without merit, and when Trump finally walked out (nearly a half an hour late), the topic stayed pretty much on point.
As we‚Äôve seen before in the debates, Trump started out subdued, but quickly went off the rails once the line of questioning from reporters began. Clearly the humiliating of the golden showers story is still eating away at him, which caused him to go off on the above, very bizarre rant about tiny cameras in hotel rooms to answer a question regarding U.S. intelligence about Russia. 
What??
‚ÄúI am extremely careful. I‚Äôm surrounded by bodyguards, I‚Äôm surrounded by people ‚Ä¶ and I always tell them, anywhere, if I‚Äôm leaving this country be very careful, because in your hotel rooms, and no matter where you go, you‚Äôre going to probably have cameras. I‚Äôm not referring just to Russia, but I would certainly put them in that category. And number one I hope you‚Äôre going to be good anyway. But in those rooms you have cameras in the strangest places. Cameras that are so small, modern technology ‚Ä¶ You can‚Äôt see them and you won‚Äôt know. You better be careful or you will be watching yourself on nightly television.‚Äù
After rambling for a bit longer, Trump suddenly turned a hard left and declared: ‚ÄúDoes anyone really believe that story? I‚Äôm also very much of a germaphobe, by the way.‚Äù If we didn‚Äôt know any better, it seems as if the gentleman doth protest too much.

Other were also quick to point that out, as Twitter gleefully began immediately riffing off of his germaphobe remark:
he did not say he is a known germaphobe. HE DID NOT. 
did he really? https://t.co/xnXLLRf85h 
‚Äî Imani Gandy (@AngryBlackLady) January 11, 2017 
"Also I'm very much a germaphobe" ‚Äì Trump (apparently referencing THAT detail in the alleged dossier)
‚Äî Katy Tur (@KatyTurNBC) January 11, 2017 
It's important to note, and ask mental health professionals about this, you can be a germaphobe and into kink. Two separate issues.
‚Äî Yashar (@yashar) January 11, 2017 
Trump Presser:
1. Putin likes me and that's good
2. There was no pee story cause I'm a germaphobe
3. the public doesn't care about my taxes pic.twitter.com/hqu1BIGm4S 
‚Äî Girls Really Rule. (@girlsreallyrule) January 11, 2017 
#TrumpPressConference is bizarre. He's talking in third person and calling himself a germaphobe to deny #goldenshowers . Is this real life?
‚Äî Briana McLeod (@bfmcleod) January 11, 2017 


Trump says he couldn't get peed on because he's a germaphobe. But pee is sterile ü§îü§îü§î https://t.co/IksAAVeO0m 
‚Äî Jordie (@BarstoolJordie) January 11, 2017 
"I'm actually a germaphobe, and that's why the pee feels so good. Because it's wrong."
‚Äî Marc Normandin (@Marc_Normandin) January 11, 2017 
Damn I love the germaphobe excuse. Next time I come back from Vegas: You know I'm allergic to glitter, of course we didn't go to the Rhino.
‚Äî Fantasy Douche (@FantasyDouche) January 11, 2017
